atelierfloral_FlowerStationRecipe.name: For the Budding Florist
atelierfloral_FlowerStationRecipe.text: @, ^^ Did you know you can bundle your flowers into bouquets to sell? I like to do it with the flowers Jas brings home, but with your flowers you could probably earn quite a bit from working with a machine like this!^^ - Marnie
atelierfloral_FragranceStationRecipe.tex: @, ^^ I clipped this out of one of my magazines. Making your own perfumes and incense is so trendy right now! Maybe you can try it out with flowers from your farm?^^ - Haley
atelierfloral_CandleStationRecipe.name: Every Good Florist Needs a Cauldron
atelierfloral_CandleStationRecipe.text: @, ^^ You read that right. If you want to dip candles or make high quality soaps with your flowers, then a cauldron is essential. It's sturdy and heats evenly, and if someone bothers you, you can throw them in too and no one will know. Just kidding.^^ - Evelyn
atelierfloral_jas_gift.name: Flowers for the Farmer
atelierfloral_jas_gift.text: @, ^^ Aunt Marnie sent you a letter about flowers and so I wanted to write you one too! We found these pretty smelling flowers in the forest together and she said you'd like them so here you go!^^ - Jas
atelierfloral_sandy_gift.name: A flower for a Friend
atelierfloral_sandy_gift.text: @, ^^ How's the flower farming going? I wish the desert could support more flowers but it just gets so hot here. One of my friends from the Gem Isles sent me these though and I thought maybe you could keep them in your greenhouse...^^ - Sandy
atelierfloral_emily_gift.name: Some Bouquet Inspiration
atelierfloral_emily_gift.text: @, ^^ Evelyn has been talking about your new flower projects and so I wanted to help! I think fairy roses would make for quite the stunning autumn bouquet, don't you?^^ - Emily
